abstract.t: This document discusses types of Instance Information to be used in conjunction with the Semantic Definition Format (SDF) for Data and Interactions of Things (draft-ietf-asdf-sdf) and will ultimately define Representation Formats for them as well as ways to use SDF Models to describe them. // The present revision is the first one after the adoption by the // ASDF Working Group. Content-wise, it is unchanged compared to the // preceding individual draft revision.
